-  GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets 

Web Service Endpoint# GET /v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets

App Store Connect API 3.6+## [URL](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-apppreviewsets#url)



```
GET https://api.appstoreconnect.apple.com/v1/appStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizations/{id}/relationships/appPreviewSets
```

## [Path Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-apppreviewsets#path-parameters)

`id``string` (Required) 

## [Query Parameters](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-apppreviewsets#query-parameters)

`limit``integer`

 Maximum: `200`## [Response Codes](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/get-v1-appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizations-_id_-relationships-apppreviewsets#response-codes)

` 200 OK``[AppStoreVersionExperimentTreatmentLocalizationAppPreviewSetsLinkagesResponse`](/documentation/appstoreconnectapi/appstoreversionexperimenttreatmentlocalizationapppreviewsetslinkagesresponse)`OK`
